org.jboss.aerogear.sync.jsonpatch.server

Class JsonPatchServerSynchronizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.aerogear.sync.jsonpatch.server.JsonPatchServerSynchronizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerSynchronizer<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode,JsonPatchEdit>

    public class JsonPatchServerSynchronizer
extends Object
implements ServerSynchronizer<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode,JsonPatchEdit>
    A ServerSynchronizer implementation that can handle JsonNode objects.
